medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Anosmia of unknown duration, thought to have been present since birth. The parents noted the patient had lacked interest in food for many years.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Recurrent otitis media (tympanostomy tubes at age 4), high-frequency hearing loss, cryptorchidism (orchiopexy at age 18 months), under evaluation for short stature.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of normal height; mother was 157 cm and father was 165 cm. No family history of anosmia or delayed puberty.
